summary: This is an email chain forwarding a legal brief filed by Ghislaine Maxwell's attorneys in the Second Circuit Court of Appeals. The brief indicates Maxwell's legal team will appeal to the Second Circuit if a motion to modify a protective order is denied, and seeks consolidation of appeals. The email is sent by Sigrid McCawley of Boies Schiller Flexner LLP.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the legal appeal; her attorneys filed a brief on her behalf in the Second Circuit.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.role: Partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP
persons.context: Sent the email forwarding the legal brief regarding Maxwell's appeal.

persons.name: Judge Nathan
persons.context: Mentioned as the judge who may deny Maxwell's motion to modify a protective order, prompting an appeal.

persons.name: Judge Preska
persons.context: Mentioned in relation to an order from which an appeal is also being pursued, with consolidation sought.

persons.name: Deborah Knowlton
persons.context: Listed as a recipient of the original notification email from the court's ECF system.

connections.description: McCawley, a partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP, is involved in forwarding legal documents related to Maxwell's appeal, indicating legal representation.

events.title: Filing of Maxwell's Appeal Brief
events.description: A legal brief is filed on behalf of Appellant Ghislaine Maxwell with the Second Circuit Court of Appeals.

events.title: Email Forwarding Legal Document
events.description: Sigrid McCawley forwards an email notification about a new court document filed in Maxwell's case to other parties.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's legal team filed a brief in the Second Circuit Court of Appeals on August 20, 2020.
The brief states an intent to appeal to the Second Circuit if Judge Nathan denies a motion to modify a protective order, and to seek consolidation with an appeal from Judge Preska's order.
The document is an email chain involving attorney Sigrid McCawley, indicating ongoing legal strategy and communication within Maxwell's defense.
